Signature, Date, and Inscription

LRC, in pencil: [B.28]
provenance: [James A. Bergquist, Newton Centre, Mass., until 2010; sold in September for $RKM, to Harry Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (2010-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LLC below image, in the plate: [Braequemond inv-fec]; URC, in the print: [1856]; ULC, in the print: [B. à D. de V]
title: Portrait of Desforges de Vassens
